pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 18, 2016:

Ottawa

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the 40th Anniversary of the European Union in Canada.

Rideau Club
99 Bank Street
Ottawa, ON

Notes for Media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
